column2: Fix did not look at the state of things in the same light.
column3: Fix did not look at the state of things in the same light.

column2: Had the hour of adversity come? Passepartout was as much excited as if the twenty thousand pounds were to come from his own pocket.
column3: Had the hour of adversity come? Passepartout was as much excited as if the twenty thousand pounds were to come from his own pocket.

column2: The storm exasperated him, the gale made him furious, and he longed to lash the obstinate sea into obedience. Poor fellow!
column3: The storm exasperated him, the gale made him furious, and he longed to lash the obstinate sea into obedience. Poor fellow!

column2: Passepartout shook it, but with no perceptible effect; for neither shaking nor maledictions could prevail upon it to change its mind.
column3: Passepartout shook it, but with no perceptible effect; for neither shaking nor maledictions could prevail upon it to change its mind.

column2: Yes, sir; but they had to repair one of her boilers, and so her departure was postponed till to-morrow.
column3: Yes, sir; but they had to repair one of her boilers, and so her departure was postponed till to morrow.

column2: Then, in her sweet, soft voice, she said: "What ought I to do, Mr. Fogg?"
column3: Then, in her sweet, soft voice, she said: "What ought I to do, mr Fogg?"

column2: Go to the Carnatic, and engage three cabins.
column3: Go to the Carnatic, and engage three cabins.
